title: Liverpool fear Alexander Isak sustained significant injury at Tottenham
description: Alexander Isak could be facing a lengthy absence after he was injured giving Liverpool the lead at Tottenham
content:
Liverpool fear their record signing Alexander Isak has sustained a significant injury and is facing a lengthy period on the sidelines.

title: Demonising migrants is risking lives, warns new equalities chief

title: Flight attendant, 25, stabbed to death at Dubai hotel 'after killer posed as guest'
description: The woman, named only as Anastasia, was found dead in a five star hotel with 15 stab wounds in the neck, torso and limb, according to reports
content:
A flight attendant has been found stabbed to death inside a five star hotel in Dubai.
The 25-year-old Russian woman, named only as Anastasia, was found dead in a five star hotel with 15 stab wounds in the neck, torso and limb, according to reports.

title: Fears Isak has broken leg could force Liverpool into transfer market
description: British record signing faces long spell on sidelines and club may look for more attacking options in January, despite £350m summer splurge
content:
Liverpool could be forced into the January transfer market over fears £130m striker Alexander Isak has broken a leg.
The Premier League champions broke the British transfer record last summer to sign Isak as part of a £350m splurge on attackers that ... [2117 chars]

title: Woman hurt in Wolverhampton hit-and-run - police hunting driver
description: Police have appealed for information following a hit-and-run in Wolverhampton.
content:
West Midlands Police have appealed for witnesses after a pedestrian was hit by a car in Wolverhampton on Saturday night.
The incident took place at around 8.40pm, and a red Seat Ibiza collided with another car before hitting a woman on the pavement.
